    AdminView
    Viewing interface for the hotel administrator
    Database

    An Enum that corresponds to the different file types that the database will read from and write to.

    An Enum that corresponds to the different genders of the guest.

    The Class that handles Guest model
    GuestManager
    The Class that manages Guest.
    GuestView

    The starting point of the application.

    A class that handles invoice model.
    MainView  
    ManagePaymentView  
    MenuItem
    MenuItem represents the menu item in the customisable menu.
    Order
    Order represents the room servce order made either by the customer/hotel personnel.
    OrderStatus
    An Enum that corresponds to the different type of order status of the order.
    OrderView
    The order viewing system for the customer
    OutOfRange
    Thrown by a Scanner to indicate that the token retrieved is not within the specified range.
    PaymentManager
    The Class that handles payment details.
    PromotionDetails
    The Class that store the rates of the hotel.
    PromotionManager
    The Class that manages the PromotionDetails of the hotel.
    Reservation
    The Class that handles Reservation model.
    ReservationManager
    The Class that manages Reservation.
    ReservationStatus
    An Enum that corresponds to the different type of reservation status of the reservation.
    ReservationView
    The Class that shows the view of Reservation.
    Room
    The Class that handles Room model
    RoomManager
    The Class that manages Room.
    RoomServiceAdminView
    The room service viewing system for the hotel administrator.
    RoomServiceManager
    RoomServiceManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classeses - AdminView and OrderView and the model classes - MenuItem and Order.
    RoomStatus
    An Enum that corresponds to the different type of room status of the room.
    RoomType
    An Enum that corresponds to the different room types.
    RoomView
    The Class that shows the view of Room.
